steps.name: Plan Your Business
steps.description: Have a strong business plan in place to make later decisions and filings easier and more predictable.

steps.name: Register and Form Your Business
steps.description: Get legally recognized by the State and federal government so you can start acting on behalf of your business.

steps.name: After Registering Your Business
steps.description: Enter insurance and/or location agreements in your business’ name to protect both you and your business legally.

steps.name: Before Opening Your Site
steps.description: Obtain industry-specific approvals or inspections to make sure you’re in compliance with State or local laws before opening.
